TextBody:
Hello Elena,

Could you please provide us the logs to take a look further? Also let me know the name of the device, the name of the group and can you give us some relevant screenshots for the case(what entities are part of the group, what policy is used etc).

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer

[image: image.png]
[image: image.png]
[image: image.png]

The policy is applied for the one special group that consists of two
computers (and two appropriate users: me and one customer
IT-administrator).
The problematic user (Edijs_Pastars) and his computer (RAREP) is not
included to the group. I'd like to highlight that only one Block&Report
Policy is here. All other policies are Report Only.
[image: image.png]

Elena Revzina
